last_episode_to_air.name: Kumudni prepares herself to go back to Krishnavati.
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kumudni talks about how she spent last 21 years staying away from Krishnavati village.Also she challenges Pradhyumna Vidhyagar Rao by blowing the conch.

name: Krishnadasi
overview: Aradhya falls in love with Aryan but is unable to keep herself away from the mysterious history of her family. She sets out to find out the identity of her father and stumbles upon grave secrets.
